overview: PsXCare takes place in a fictive future where the border between the digital and the physical is blurred, shifting between filmed and animated material. The work portrays a feeling of alienation related to cities and constructed spaces. A feeling that stems from living in a time and place where everything is designed for specific purposes, hence steering your attention and needs much like in a video game. According to German philosopher Hartmut Rosa, alienation is a direct effect of what he calls modernityâ€™s backside; social acceleration, often experienced in a fast-paced city environment.
title: PsXCare
